growthexperiments-addimage-onboarding-co: Hoton na iya taimakon mutane wajen fahimtar maudu'in, amman dayawan mukalolin basuda hotuna.
A wannan aikin, {{GENDER:$1"you'll}} sannan ka yanke hukunci ko hoton da Wikimedia Commons ( kundin bayanai na ikon da aka saki kyauta) ya cancanta ga Wikipedia wanna baida hoto.
Wa’innan hotunan mashin ne ya zabe shi, amman suna iya zama kuskure. Shiyasa {{GENDER:$1|your}} ake bukatan tantancewa
Kalla wannan shawararran  hoton kuma ka duba bayanan.
Domin taimakwa wajen zabi idan ya cancanta, kalli hoton, sunanshi, bayananshi sanna dalin zaben shi. Shin ya cancanta da makalar?
{{GENDER:$1|You}} ana iya fadada shi zuwa cikin hoto domai samun karin bayanai
Wannan ya dace da wannan mukalar?
Karanta makalar da ke bukatan hoto. Shin zababen hoton ya kamata a iya bude shi? Shin makaranci yana iya gane maudu'in?

ta

Jaddada idan ya cancanta da mukalar
Hoton na iya kasancewa daga maudu'i mai kuskure, ko mai karancin kwaliti. Yi amfani da {{GENDER:$1|your}} domin tantance shi.

Rabi da shawarwarin mashin marasa kyaw ko ka tsallake in
